column183: The purpose of this overlay district to promote the public health, safety, and welfare by protecting the shorelines of the Winooski and Huntington Rivers, Gillette Pond and the Richmond portion of Lake Iroquois from erosion, pollution, and visual blight. These bodies of water are recognized as providing important wildlife habitat, recreational opportunities, and scenic enjoyment for the public.  The Shoreline District includes shorelines listed in the Richmond Town Plan and are regulated as depicted on the official “Shoreline Protection Overlay Map” of the Town of Richmond, in accordance with the Act (§4414).
